text: The Director shall each year submit to the executive committee and to the Director of the Court Services and Offender Supervision Agency for the District of Columbia a report as to the Pretrial Services Agency's administration of its responsibilities for the previous fiscal year. The Director shall include in the report a statement of financial condition, revenues, and expenses for the past fiscal year.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 23-1307.

1973 Ed., § 23-1307.

Legislative History of Laws

Law 7-104, the "Technical Amendments Act of 1987," was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 7-346, which was referred to the Committee of the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 24, 1987 and December 8, 1987, respectively. Signed by Mayor on December 22, 1987, it was assigned Act No. 7-124 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.

DC CODE § 23-1307

Current through December 11, 2012

division.text: Criminal Law and Procedure and Prisoners.

chapter.text: Bail Agency [Pretrial Services Agency] and Pretrial Detention.

subchapter.text: District of Columbia Bail Agency [Pretrial Services Agency]. (Refs & Annos)
